caption:
This photograph depicts a scene inside a laboratory. A man is shown in a side profile, wearing glasses and a white lab coat, actively engaged in a delicate task. He is adjusting or interacting with scientific apparatus on a table. The apparatus consists of transparent conical flasks connected to vertical glass tubes arranged in a series with valves. Each setup is identical and meticulously aligned on the metal table.

The background is a plain mustard-colored wall, which contrasts with the primarily transparent and white objects in the foreground, emphasizing the vibrancy yet simplicity of the scene. The focus and illumination on the lab equipment highlight their importance, suggesting experiments or measurements that require precision and care.

The man's actions and attire suggest scientific method and research, typical of a professional laboratory environment. His attention to the apparatus speaks to the careful handling these procedures demand. Also, the laboratory setting conveys an atmosphere of investigation and discovery.
title: EPA Gulf Breeze laboratory: chemistry lab. A physical science technician is evaporating solvent to determine pesticide content of residue.
